anime.name: The Flower We Saw That Day
anime.category: Drama, Supernatural, Slice of Life, Romance
anime.creator: Mari Okada
anime.summary: Jinta Yadomi and his group of childhood friends have become estranged after a tragic accident split them apart. Now in their high school years, a sudden surprise forces each of them to confront their guilt over what happened that day and come to terms with the ghosts of their past.
